DescriptionData.Title: AJs Girls Thigh High Ragdoll Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Our thigh high ragdoll socks in child size for younger performers. The 26 inch long socks in stripes are exactly like the adult version except scaled down for kids! Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and fits socks size 6 - 9 (approx. 8-12 yrs).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Child thigh-high ragdoll socks
26" long with stripes
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
Long tube socks fit sock size 6-9 (approx 8-12 yrs)
Socks come in pairs

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Checkered Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: These knee high tube socks come with a checker pattern and are sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13, shoe sizes 5 and up). Black and white checks extend from the top to the ankle, and the socks have a solid black, cushioned foot. Available in a range of colors, approximately 25 inches long. Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Knee-high checkered socks
25 inch long tube socks fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13, shoe sizes 5 and up)
Checks extend from the top to the ankle, with a solid colored foot
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
Socks come in pairs

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Adult Thigh High Ragdoll Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Our thigh high ragdoll socks have stripes all the way down to the toe. Socks are 29 inches long and made with 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13). Fits up to a 20 inch circumference thigh.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Over the knee ragdoll socks
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
29" long tube socks fit most adults (sock size 11-13)
Fits up to a 20" circumference thigh
Socks come in pairs
